snippet.title: Swastikas lead to Wolfenstein recall in Germany
snippet.description: ...Cultural sensitivity isn't something that is often considered when releasing a video game, but when it is, publishers usually have only a couple of options: censoring offensive content, not releasing a game in problematic regions, or recalling the title after the material has been recognized. Activision Blizzard has gone with the latter option, pulling Wolfenstein from store shelves because ...

snippet.title: Wolfenstein brings the supernatural front and center
snippet.description: ...On the screen, some German soldiers slowly float to the ceiling, firing their weapons wildly. A few rounds into their bodies and they're toast, and gravity becomes normal again. The supernatural has always been a part of the Wolfenstein series, but the newest entry into the franchise, simply called Wolfenstein, brings the invisible world front and center. In the course of the game, B.J. Blaz...

snippet.title: The challenge is set: make Wolfenstein a hit, get game free
snippet.description: ...This is one of the more interesting promotions in recent memory. If Wolfenstein outsells Madden 10 in August, one of the designers of the first-person shooter will refund you the cost of the game. At least, that's the deal laid out via Raven Software's Manveer Heir's Twitter...
